Package roborally.game

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • roborally.game.Grid
  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads through a tmx map encoded with Base64 and compressed with zlib. For each layer in the tmx map found by hitting a line that includes the field "layer id" it decodes and decompresses the input to make a map of the name of the layer with another map as value. The value is a map that consists of GridPoint2 positions and TileNames of the tiles included in the specific layer.

    To get a perspective of what the class makes, use the method printGrid() to display all the layers with all the tiles and positions.

      • findTileName

        public TileName findTileName​(LayerName layerToCheck,
                             com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos)
        Method to check a specific layer, i.e the conveyorFastLayer, and finds a TileName if any on that position that is contained in that very layer.
        Parameters:
        layerToCheck - The layer to search for the TileName in.
        pos - The position the player is standing on.
        Returns:
        null if the position the player is standing on does not contain a TileName in the given layer, else it returns the TileName.

      • getTilesAtPosition

        public java.util.Iterator<TileName> getTilesAtPosition​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos)
        Takes a position on the map and makes an iterator with all the tileNames at that position.
        Parameters:
        pos - GridPoint2 with position on the map.
        Returns:
        Iterator with tileNames.
